text: oru manusyannum allahu yateannum avatarippiccukeatuttittilla ennu paranna sandarbhattil allahuve vilayiruttenta muraprakaram vilayiruttatirikkukayan avar ceytat‌. parayuka: ennal satyaprakasamayikkeantum, manusyarkk margadarsakamayikkeantum musa keantu vanna grantham aran avatarippiccat ? ninnal atine katalas tuntukalakki cila bhagannal velippetuttukayum, (marru) palatum olicc vekkukayum ceyyunnuntallea. ninnalkkea ninnalute pitakkanmarkkea arivillatirunna palatum (a granthattilute) ninnal pathippikkappettittumunt‌. allahuvan (at avatarippiccat‌) enn parayuka. pinnit avarute kutarkkannalumayi vilayatuvan avare vittekkuka
